page.title: 17EXETER AIRPORT:ITS WORK.
page.content: {Exeter Airport. In the Airport people go to work. There are a lot of different jobs like a Clerk,Engineer,porters,aircrew and emergency services.There are a lot of factories around the Airport for example Sparex,Boyce and Co and Revills.I like the Airport because every year there is an air display. Some planes fly to Spain and other countries.In the past year the runways were made longer and some buildings were changed.This is to allow bigger planes to use the airport. A modern radar system has just been installed. There is a Flying Club for people whose hobby is flying and to teach those who are interested how to fly.
